content:
Hi Cantaruttiis

No, directly transferring emails from Thunderbird desktop to the Android app is not possible or supported. Your can upload them to the server, then download to the mobile app.

You might be interested in raising a feature suggestion on Mozilla Connect where the community can vote for your idea.

https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas/label-name/thunderbird%20android
creator: platform34
